TopicTitle: How do I make a signature that shows whenever I make a post or comment?

Articles.Content: I see most posters have this, and am wondering how I can make one, and importantly also, how to imbed pictures in it and imbed URL's into sentences. Thanks. ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)

Settings (top right) > Edit Signature (somewhere in "my settings" on the left)

Then use the text editor function to add whatever links, images, videos you want.
Have a look at the [Forum FAQ](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/48073-Forum-FAQ-%E2%80%93-Answers-for-New-Users) for more detailed information. It answers lots of other questions, too!

> 
> Settings (top right) > Edit Signature (somewhere in "my settings" on the left)
> Then use the text editor function to add whatever links, images, videos you want.

Thank you ! +rep

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/misc.php?do=bbcode](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/misc.php?do=bbcode) shows the formatting and other commands available in posts and signatures. The latter is limited in size and length though, for obvious reasons. To embed pictures you'll have to upload them first to a hosting site (eg; [http://imgur.com](http://imgur.com)) and then embed the link that that provides. 'large thumbnail' is a good size for pictures in posts, clickable so people can see the full-size thing if they want to.
